lead_paragraph: Although the conference title games largely lacked disputed calls by the officials, week after week this season, fans and teams were riled by calls that were questionable or even flat-out weird.

headline.print_headline: Reviewing the Calls: A Season’s Worth of Curious Moments
headline.main: The 10 Times N.F.L. Referees May Have Blown It This Season

snippet: Although the conference title games largely lacked disputed calls by the officials, week after week this season, fans and teams were riled by calls that were questionable or even flat-out weird.
abstract: NFL season has been characterized by number of calls that have incensed fans, coaches and players; ten notably contentious calls highlighted and explained.
